Experience Associate Hardware Engineer IBM India Private Limited June 2012  – Present (3 years 3 months) IBM Bangalore 1) Currently working on Design of Multi Impedance Multi Slew IOs for 200MHz applications in

* Schematic architecture design and simulations. 
* Layout and Post-Layout sims.( To be started)

BiCMOS8WL (130nm) technologies. 
Time-line : June 2013 - Dec 2013 
Key Responsibilities: 
* Schematic Design  
* Layout Design and Post-extraction simulations 
* LEF Generation and Back-End testing. 
 
 
3) Worked in design of ESD CLAMP circuits for CMOS6RF(250nm) technology. 
Time-line : March-2013 - April 2013 
Key Responsibilities: 
* Schematic simulations. 
* Layout improvement for Latch-up.
